{"id":1040985816,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1693896850,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1040985816/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Balanced Substring of a Binary String","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findTheLongestBalancedSubstring(string s) {\n        int balance = 0;\n        size_t idx = 0;\n        int count_z = 0, count_o = 0;\n\n        while (idx < s.length()) {\n            size_t i = idx;\n            if (s[idx] == '0') {\n                count_z = 0;\n                for (; i < s.length(); i++) {\n                    if (s[i] != '0')\n                        break;\n                    count_z++;\n                }\n                idx = i;\n            }\n            // \"1\"\n            else {\n                count_o = 0;\n                for (; i < s.length(); i++) {\n                    if (s[i] != '1')\n                        break;\n                    count_o++;\n                }\n                if (count_z == count_o)\n                    balance = max(balance, count_z + count_o);\n                else if (count_z < count_o && count_z != 0)\n                    balance = max(balance, 2 * count_z);\n                else if (count_z > count_o && count_o != 0)\n                    balance = max(balance, 2 * count_o);\n                idx = i;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return balance;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-balanced-substring-of-a-binary-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
